text: Nturonka abantu bemera Imana yabo y’ukuri hamwe n’umusi w’imperuka yuko baba kunda bamwe bahakana Imana yabo y’ukuri hamwe n’intumwa yayo, naho boba ari abavyeyi babo, canke ibibondo vyabo, canke bene wabo, canke incuti zabo, abo nibo banditswe mu mitima yabo n’ukwemera kwabo n’ukubashiramwo ubushobozi k’umutima uvuye iwe, kandi izobinjiza mu mirima icamwo inzuzi imbere yabo, iyo niyo bazobayo mu buzima bwabo bwose, n’Imana yarabemereye kuribo, nabo barayemereye
